resources.string: Download has failed. Tap to try again.
You currently have all Location Services for this device or application disabled. Please enable them in Settings.
Ili kuhakikisha urambazaji sahihi huwezesha eneo sahihi katika mipangilio.
Bure kwa kila mtu, iliyotengenezwa na upendo
• Hakuna matangazo, hakuna ufuatiliaji, hakuna mkusanyiko wa data
• Hakuna betri kuisha, inafanya kazi nje ya mtandao
Maombi ya chanzo-wazi iliyoundwa na wanaovutia na wanaojitolea.
The app requires hardware accelerated OpenGL. Unfortunately, your device is not supported.
Please disconnect USB cable or insert memory card to use Organic Maps
Please free up some space on the SD card/USB storage first in order to use the app
Before you start using the app, please download the world overview map to your device.\nIt will use %s of storage.
Downloading %s. You can now\nproceed to the map.
Select the folder to download maps to.
This can take several minutes.\nPlease wait…
Organic Maps bookmarks were shared with you

Hello!

Attached are my bookmarks; please open them in Organic Maps. If you don't have it installed you can download it here: https://omaps.app/get?kmz

Enjoy travelling with Organic Maps!
Bookmarks loaded successfully! You can find them on the map or on the Bookmarks Manager screen.
Failed to load bookmarks. The file may be corrupted or defective.
Aina ya faili haitambuliwi na programu:\n%1$s
Your location hasn\'t been determined yet
Sorry, Map Storage settings are currently disabled.
Map download is in progress now.
Check out my current location in Organic Maps! %1$s or %2$s Don\'t have offline maps? Download here: https://omaps.app/get
Hey, check out my pin in Organic Maps!
Hey, check out my current location on the Organic Maps map!

Hi,

I'm here now: %1$s. Click this link %2$s or this one %3$s to see the place on the map.

Thanks.
Je, una uhakika unataka kuondoka kwenye akaunti yako ya OpenStreetMap?
Majengo ya 3D yamezimwa katika hali ya kuokoa nishati
Ikiwashwa, jina la barabara au la kutoka ili kuwasha litasemwa kwa sauti.
Angalia mipangilio ya sauti au ya mfumo ya kubadilisha maandishi-hadi-hotuba ikiwa husikii sauti sasa.
Improve arrow direction by moving the phone in a figure-eight motion to calibrate the compass.
Move the phone in a figure-eight motion to calibrate the compass and fix the arrow direction on the map.
Gusa kwa muda mrefu kwenye ramani tena ili kuona kiolesura
To delete map, please stop navigation.
Routes can only be created that are fully contained within a map of a single region.
Huduma za Mahali za Google Play
Tambua kwa haraka kadirio la eneo lako kwa kutumia Bluetooth, WiFi au mtandao wa simu
Download all of the maps along your route
In order to create a route, we need to download and update all the maps from your location to your destination.
Zawadia mamilioni ya watumiaji ramani za bure bila matangazo!
Ripoti au urekebishe data isiyo sahihi ya ramani
The email client has not been set up. Please configure it or contact us at %s
When following the route, please keep in mind:
— Road conditions, traffic laws, and road signs always take priority over navigation hints;
— The map might be inaccurate, and the suggested route might not always be the most optimal way to reach the destination;
— Suggested routes should only be understood as recommendations;
— Exercise caution with routes in border zones: the routes created by our app may sometimes cross country borders in unauthorized places.
Please stay alert and safe on the roads!
Unable to create route. Current GPS coordinates could not be identified.
Please check your GPS signal. Enabling Wi-Fi will improve your location accuracy.
Unable to locate current GPS coordinates. Enable location services to calculate route.
Please adjust your starting point or destination.
Route was not created. Unable to locate starting point.
Please select a starting point closer to a road.
Route was not created. Unable to locate the destination.
Please select a destination point located closer to a road.
Tafadhali badilisha eneo lako la kati.
Unable to create route due to an application error.
Would you like to download the map and create a more optimal route spanning more than one map?
Download additional maps to create a better route that crosses the boundaries of this map.
Download or update all maps along the projected path to calculate a route.
To start searching and creating routes, please download the map. After that you will no longer need an Internet connection.
Pakua eneo ambalo unatafuta au jaribu kuongeza jina la mji/kijiji kilicho karibu.
Navigation is only available from your current location.
Do you want to plan a route from your current location?
Please describe the problem in detail so that the OpenStreetMap community can fix it.
Or do it yourself at https://www.openstreetmap.org/
All of your map edits will be deleted with the map.
To create a route, you need to update all maps and then plan the route again.
Please make sure your device is connected to the Internet.
Buruta ramani ili kuweka msalaba katika eneo la mahali au biashara.
Kama ilivyoandikwa katika lugha ya kienyeji
No object can be located here
Data ya OpenStreetMap iliyoundwa na jumuiya kufikia %s. Pata maelezo zaidi kuhusu jinsi ya kuhariri na kusasisha ramani katika OpenStreetMap.org

OpenStreetMap.org (OSM) ni mradi wa jumuiya wa kujenga ramani isiyolipishwa na iliyo wazi. Ndiyo chanzo kikuu cha data ya ramani katika Ramani za Kikaboni na inafanya kazi sawa na Wikipedia. Unaweza kuongeza au kubadilisha maeneo na yanapatikana kwa mamilioni ya watumiaji kote Ulimwenguni.\nJiunge na jumuiya na usaidie kutengeneza ramani bora kwa kila mtu!
Fungua akaunti ya OpenStreetMap au ingia ili kuchapisha mabadiliko yako ya ramani kwa ulimwengu.
Download over a cellular network connection?
This could be considerably expensive with some plans or if roaming.
The number of floors must non exceed %d
Kumbuka kwa wanaojitolea wa OpenStreetMap (si lazima)
Eleza hitilafu kwenye ramani au kile ambacho hakiwezi kuhaririwa kwa kutumia Ramani za Kikaboni
Mabadiliko yako yanapakiwa kwenye hifadhidata ya OpenStreetMap ya umma. Tafadhali usiongeze maelezo ya kibinafsi au yenye hakimiliki.
Vidokezo vya data ya ramani yako

Ramani za Kikaboni huruhusu kuongeza kategoria rahisi pekee, hiyo inamaanisha hakuna miji, barabara, maziwa, muhtasari wa majengo, n.k. Tafadhali ongeza kategoria kama hizo moja kwa moja kwenye OpenStreetMap.org. Angalia mwongozo wetu kwa maagizo ya kina ya hatua kwa hatua.
Download maps to search and navigate offline.
Please indicate the reason for deleting the place
Enter a valid Facebook web address, account, or page name
Enter a valid Instagram username or web address
Enter a valid Twitter username or web address
Enter a valid VK username or web address
Enter a valid LINE ID or web address
Or, alternatively, leave a note to OpenStreetMap community so that someone else can add or fix a place here.
Note will be sent to OpenStreetMap
Do you want to send it to all users?
Make sure you did not enter any private or personal data.
Wahariri wa OpenStreetMap watakagua mabadiliko na kuwasiliana nawe ikiwa wana maswali yoyote.
Use mobile internet to show detailed information?
Mobile internet is required for map update notifications and uploading edits.
To display traffic data, maps must be updated.
Tunatumia maagizo ya sautii ya TTS ya mfumo. Vifaa vingi vya Android vinatumia Google TTS, unaweza kuipakua au kuisasisha kwenye Google Play

Kwa baadhi ya lugha, utahitaji kusakinisha programu nyingine ya kusanidi usemi au kifurushi cha ziada cha lugha kutoka kwenye duka la programu-tumizi (Google Play, Galaxy Store, App Gallery, FDroid).\nFungua mipangilio ya kifaa chako → Lugha na Ingizo → Usemi → Tokeo la maandishi kuwa usemi.\nHapa unaweza kusimamia usanidi wa usemi (kwa mfano, kupakua kifurushi cha lugha ili utumie nje ya mtandao) na uchague injini nyingine ya maandishi-kuwa-usemi.
Kwa maelezo zaidi tafadhali tazama mwongozo huu.
Tumia utafutaji au uguse kwenye ramani ili kuongeza mahali pa kuanzia
Tumia utafutaji au uguse kwenye ramani ili kuongeza mahali unakoenda
Tafadhali ingia kwenye OpenStreetMap ili kupakia kiotomatiki hariri zako zote za ramani. Pata maelezo zaidi hapa.
Hifadhi ya nje haipatikani, pengine Kadi ya SD imeondolewa, imeharibika au mfumo wa faili ni wa kusoma pekee. Tafadhali ikague na uwasiliane nasi kwa kutumia support\@organicmaps.app
Haiwezekani kushiriki kutokana na hitilafu ya programu

plurals.name: bookmarks_detect_message
plurals.item: Faili %d ilipatikana. Utaiona baada ya uongofu.
Files %d zimepatikana. Utaziona baada ya uongofu.

resources.string: Ili kuongeza ramani, gusa mahali kwenye ramani na kisha gusa ikoni ya nyota
Pindi mtindo wa kiotomatiki unapochaguliwa programu tumizi inaanza kuzima sifa za kumaliza betri kulingana na kiwango cha chaji cha sasa cha betri
If there are too many bookmarks, displaying their names on the map may slow down the app.
Chaguo huwasha data kwa madhumuni ya uchunguzi. Itakuwa muhimu kwa wafanyakazi wetu ambao wanatatua matatizo ya programu. Washa chaguo hili kwa maombi ya mhudumu wa Organic Maps tu.
Bahati mbaya hatukuweza kupata njia labda kwa sababu ya machaguo msingi. Tafadhali badili mipangilio na jaribu tena
Download and update all map along the projected path to calculate route.
You’ve changed the world map! Don\'t keep it to yourself; tell your friends and edit it together.
Add new places to the map, and edit existing ones directly from the app.
To download, you need more space. Please delete any unnecessary data.
I improved the Organic Maps maps
Your suggested map changes will be sent to the OpenStreetMap community. Please describe any additional details that cannot be edited in Organic Maps.
An error occurred while determining your location. Check that your device is working properly and try again later.
Enable access to geolocation in the device settings
Au endelea kutumia Organic Maps bila Mahali
Disable recording of your recently travelled route?
Organic Maps uses your location in the background to record your recently travelled route.
To display traffic data, the application must be updated.
Tafadhali ingia kwenye OpenStreetMap ili kupakia kiotomatiki hariri zako zote za ramani. Pata maelezo zaidi
Jina hili ni muda mrefu sana
Kosa limetokea wakati wa kupakua vibandiko, tafadhali jaribu tena
Mbao-bonye haipatikani wakati wa kuendesha gari
Haiwezi kuunda njia kutokea kwenye eneo lako la sasa
Haiwezi kuunda njia kwenda uendako. Tafadhali chagua sehemu nyingine
Hakuna ishara ya GPS. Tafadhali sogea katika eneo jingine la wazi
Haiwezi kuunda njia. Tafadhali taja kituo kingine cha njia
Kuunda njia, pakua ramani zilizokosekana kwenye kifaa chako
Hitilafu imetokea. Tafadhali iwashe tena programu
Njia itaundwa upya kutokea kwenye sehemu yako la sasa
Badili utumie simu ili kuona alamisho zote
Tafadhali pakua ramani katika programu tumizi ya Organic Maps kwenye kifaa chako
Uabiri wa njia ya chini kwa chini katika mkoa huu haupatikani bado
Njia ya chini kwa chini haipatikani
Chagua nyota au alama ya mwisho karibu ya kituo cha njia ya chini kwa chini
Kuamilisha na kutumia tabaka la nchi tafadhali sasisha au pakua ramani ya eneo hilo
Tabaka la sura ya nchi bado haipatikani katika eneo hili
Vuta karibu kutalii mistari ya kontua
Unable to create folder and move files on internal device\'s memory or sdcard
Ikiwashwa, skrini itakuwa imewashwa wakati wa kuonyesha ramani.
When enabled, the app will work on the lockscreen even when the device is locked.
Asante kwa kutumia ramani zetu zilizojengwa na jumuiya!
Kwa michango na usaidizi wako, tunaweza kuunda ramani bora zaidi Duniani!
Je, unapenda programu yetu? Tafadhali toa mchango ili kusaidia maendeleo! Je, huipendi bado? Tafadhali tujulishe, na tutarekebisha!
Ikiwa unajua msanidi programu, unaweza kumwomba kutekeleza kipengele unachohitaji.
Gusa popote kwenye ramani ili kuchagua chochote. Gusa kwa muda mrefu ili kuficha na kuonyesha kiolesura.
Je, unajua kwamba unaweza kuchagua eneo lako la sasa kwenye ramani?
Unaweza kusaidia kutafsiri programu yetu katika lugha yako.
Programu yetu imeundwa na washiriki wachache na jamii.
Unaweza kurekebisha na kuboresha data ya ramani kwa urahisi.
Lengo letu kuu ni kujenga ramani za haraka, zinazozingatia faragha, na rahisi kutumia ambazo utapenda.
Sasa unatumia ramani za kikaboni kwenye skrini ya simu
Sasa unatumia ramani za kikaboni kwenye skrini ya gari
Organic Maps zinahitaji ufikiaji wa eneo. Ikiwa salama, angalia arifa kwenye simu yako.
Organic Maps katika Android Auto zinahitaji ruhusa ya eneo ili kufanya kazi kwa ufanisi
Mipangilio ya usanisi wa hotuba ya mfumo
Mipangilio ya Usanisi wa Matamshi haikupatikana, una uhakika kuwa kifaa chako kinaitumia?
Kwa urambazaji sahihi zaidi, tunapendekeza kuzima hali ya kuokoa nishati katika mipangilio ya betri ya simu.
Ungependa kuhifadhi katika alama na njia?
Njia ni tupu - hakuna cha kuhifadhi
Haiwezi kuonyesha kidirisha cha kuchagua folda kwa sababu hakuna programu inayofaa iliyosakinishwa kwenye kifaa chako. Tafadhali sakinisha programu ya kidhibiti faili na ujaribu tena
Hakuna Programu iliyosakinishwa inayoweza kufungua eneo
Kusasisha ramani kunaweka taarifa kuhusu vipengee ikiwa ya hivi sasa zaidi
Je, una uhakika unataka kufuta wimbo huu?

Je, ungependa kutuma ripoti ya hitilafu kwa wasanidi programu?\nTunategemea watumiaji wetu kwani Ramani za Kikaboni hazikusanyi maelezo yoyote ya hitilafu kiotomatiki. Asante mapema kwa kusaidia Ramani za Organic!
Usawazishaji wa iCloud ni kipengele cha majaribio kinachoendelezwa. Hakikisha kuwa umefanya nakala rudufu ya alamisho na nyimbo zako zote.
Tafadhali wezesha iCloud katika mipangilio ya kifaa chako ili kutumia kipengele hiki.
Hitilafu: Imeshindwa kusawazisha kwa sababu ya hitilafu ya muunganisho
Hitilafu: Imeshindwa kusawazisha kwa sababu ya mgao wa iCloud uliozidishwa
Unahitaji kusasisha ramani ya %s hadi toleo jipya zaidi kabla ya kuchangia kwenye data ya OpenStreetMap
To display routes, maps must be updated.
Ramani ya njia ya chini haipatikani
Detecting location in the background is necessary to fully enjoy the functionality of the app. It is used for navigation and saving your recently traveled track.
Determining your location is necessary for navigation and for saving your recently traveled track.
